name: blockchain-inventory-system
description: Enterprise-grade blockchain inventory management system with AI agents

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../ai-agents && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ai-agents"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:ai-agents
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:ai-agents && npm run test:blockchain
scripts.blockchain:deploy: cd blockchain && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && cd backend && npm audit && cd ../frontend && npm audit
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:ai-agents && npm run lint:blockchain
scripts.start: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend & npm run start:ai-agents

author: Enterprise Blockchain Team
